author: elena
msg: update docs to specify which methods are used by the Xerces DOM parser directly

author: neilg
msg: since it is now recognized by IANA, add GB18030 to the list of supported encodings.

author: sandygao
msg: Remove the schema validator from the pipeline when it's not supposed to
1. A DTD grammar was found, but no schema grammar was found.
2. Dynamic validation is on, but no schema grammar was found.
